termsOfService.title: Terms and Conditions
termsOfService.paragraph: Welcome to globalrelocate.com! These Terms and Conditions ('Terms') govern your use of our AI-powered platform for seamless relocation, legal guidance, and global living, accessed through the URL globalrelocate.com (referred to as 'the Platform'). By accessing or using the Platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms. Please read them carefully.

sections.platformUse_1: 1.1 Eligibility: You must be at least 18 years old or have the legal capacity to enter into contracts in your jurisdiction to use the Platform. By accessing or using the Platform, you represent and warrant that you meet the eligibility requirements.
sections.platformUse_2: 1.2 User Account: You may be required to create a user account to access certain features of the Platform. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and agree to be solely responsible for all activities conducted through your account.
sections.platformUse_3: 1.3 Prohibited Activities: You agree not to engage in any activities that violate these Terms or any applicable laws or regulations. Prohibited activities include, but are not limited to:
sections.prohibited_2: Uploading or sharing content that is illegal, harmful, or infringing upon the rights of others
sections.prohibited_3: Interfering with the proper functioning of the Platform
sections.intellectualProperty_1: 2.1 Ownership: All content, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, audio clips, videos, and software, available on the Platform is owned by Global Relocate or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws.
sections.intellectualProperty_2: 2.2 Use of Content: You may access and use the content on the Platform for personal, non-commercial purposes only. You may not modify, reproduce, distribute, display, perform, or create derivative works from the content without prior written permission from Global Relocate.
sections.disclaimer_1: 3.1 The Platform is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis without warranties of any kind. Global Relocate disclaims all warranties, whether express or implied, including but not limited to merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.
sections.disclaimer_2: 3.2 Global Relocate does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any content or information on the Platform. You acknowledge that your use of the Platform is at your own risk.
sections.liability_1: 4.1 To the maximum extent permitted by law, Global Relocate and its directors, employees, affiliates, and agents shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in any way connected with your use of the Platform or the content therein.
sections.thirdParty_1: 5.1 The Platform may contain links to third-party websites or services. Global Relocate is not responsible for the content, accuracy, or reliability of any third-party websites or services. The inclusion of any such links does not imply endorsement or affiliation by Global Relocate.
sections.modifications_1: 6.1 Global Relocate reserves the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part or all of the Platform, temporarily or permanently, without prior notice. Global Relocate shall not be liable to you or any third party for any modifications, suspension, or discontinuation of the Platform.
sections.governingLaw_1: 7.1 These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Country]. Any dispute arising out of or relating to these Terms or your use of the Platform shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in [Your City, Country].
sections.entireAgreement_1: 8.1 These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and Global Relocate regarding the use of the Platform and supersede any prior or contemporaneous agreements, communications, or representations.
sections.whyChoose_1: At Global Relocate, we are committed to helping you relocate smarter and live better. Here’s why you should choose us:
sections.whyChoose_bullet1: Time-Saving AI-Supported Data: Access always up-to-date and reliable information to make informed decisions.
sections.whyChoose_bullet2: Verified Contacts & Trusted Sources: Benefit from a community-based platform ensuring credibility and trust.
sections.whyChoose_bullet3: All-in-One Solution: Find everything from visas to cost of living in one place.
sections.whyChoose_bullet4: Personalized Alerts: Stay ahead with tailored notifications and a favorites feature designed just for you.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy and Legal Disclaimer
privacyPolicy.paragraph: This Privacy Policy describes how Global Relocate (referred to as 'us,' 'we,' or 'our'), the owner and operator of globalrelocate.com, collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our AI-powered platform for seamless relocation, legal guidance, and global living, accessed through the URL globalrelocate.com (the 'Platform'). This policy also applies to any services, content, features, or applications provided through the Platform.
privacyPolicy.paragraph2: By accessing or using the Platform, you agree to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information as outlined in this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with any aspect of this policy, please refrain from using the Platform.

sections.informationCollection_1: 1.1 Personal Information: We may collect various types of personal information from you when you use the Platform. This may include your name, email address, contact information, relocation preferences, and any other information you voluntarily provide to us.
sections.informationCollection_2: 1.2 Usage Data: We automatically collect certain non-personally identifiable information about your use of the Platform. This may include your IP address, browser type, operating system, device information, pages visited, referring/exit URLs, and other similar data.
sections.personalInformationUse: 2.1 Personal Information: We may use the personal information you provide to us for the following purposes:
sections.personalInformationUse_bullet1: To provide and improve our AI-powered relocation services, legal guidance, and global living resources.
sections.personalInformationUse_bullet2: To process your requests, provide personalized relocation plans, and deliver tailored content.
sections.personalInformationUse_bullet3: To communicate with you, respond to inquiries, and provide customer support.
sections.personalInformationUse_bullet4: To send personalized alerts, updates, and notifications about visas, cost of living, and other relocation-related information.
sections.personalInformationUse_bullet5: To enhance your experience on the Platform by offering a favorites feature and tailored recommendations.
sections.personalInformationUse_bullet6: To enforce our Terms of Service and other policies.
sections.usageDataUse: 2.2 Usage Data: We use usage data to analyze trends, track user engagement, monitor the effectiveness of our services, and enhance the user experience on the Platform.
sections.informationSharing_1: 3.1 Third-Party Service Providers: We may share your personal information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating the Platform, delivering services, processing payments, conducting analytics, or performing other necessary functions. These service providers are bound by strict confidentiality agreements and are prohibited from using your personal information for any other purposes.
sections.informationSharing_2: 3.2 Legal Compliance and Protection: We may disclose your personal information if required by law, regulation, legal process, or government request. We may also disclose your information to protect our rights, property, or safety, as well as the rights, property, or safety of our users or others.
sections.cookies_1: 4.1 We use cookies and other tracking technologies on the Platform to collect and store certain information. Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device to help us analyze Platform usage, remember user preferences, and enhance your overall experience. You have the option to disable cookies through your browser settings; however, this may limit certain functionalities of the Platform.
sections.dataSecurity_1: 5.1 We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, please be aware that no data transmission over the internet or storage method is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee the absolute security of your personal information.
sections.thirdPartyLinks_1: 6.1 The Platform may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by us. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third-party sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party websites you visit.
sections.childrenPrivacy_1: 7.1 The Platform is not intended for individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected personal information from a child under 13, we will take steps to delete the information promptly.
sections.changesToPolicy_1: 8.1 We reserve the right to modify or update this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting the revised policy on the Platform. We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed of any updates.
sections.whyGlobalRelocate_1: At Global Relocate, we are committed to helping you relocate smarter and live better. Here’s why you should choose us:
sections.whyGlobalRelocate_bullet1: Time-Saving AI-Supported Data: Access always up-to-date and reliable information to make informed decisions.
sections.whyGlobalRelocate_bullet2: Verified Contacts & Trusted Sources: Benefit from a community-based platform ensuring credibility and trust.
sections.whyGlobalRelocate_bullet3: All-in-One Solution: Find everything from visas to cost of living in one place.
sections.whyGlobalRelocate_bullet4: Personalized Alerts: Stay ahead with tailored notifications and a favorites feature designed just for you.
sections.contactUs_1: 10.1 If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

helpCenter.checkOut: Check out our FAQs or contact us for more support.

question1.question: What is Global Relocate?
question1.answer: Global Relocate is an AI-powered platform designed to assist individuals and families in relocating to new countries. It provides personalized recommendations, resources, and support to make the relocation process smoother and more efficient.

question2.question: What does Global Relocate help to achieve?
question2.answer: Global Relocate helps users achieve a seamless relocation experience by offering tailored advice, resources, and support for various aspects of moving to a new country, including visa applications, housing, employment, and cultural integration.

question3.question: Does Global Relocate charge users for services of features ?
question3.answer: Yes, Global Relocate offers a range of services and features that may involve charges. However, it also provides free resources and basic support to help users get started with their relocation journey.

question4.question: What happens to my data / Does Global Relocate sotre my personal information?
question4.answer: Global Relocate takes user privacy seriously. We do not store personal information unless explicitly provided by the user for specific services. Any data collected is used solely to enhance the user experience and provide personalized recommendations. For more details, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

question5.question: Who are the people behind Global Relocate?
question5.answer: Global Relocate is developed by a team of experienced professionals in the fields of AI, relocation services, and international law. Our team is dedicated to providing the best possible support and resources for individuals and families looking to relocate.

question6.question: Is Global Relocate available in multiple languages?
question6.answer: Yes, Global Relocate is available in multiple languages to cater to a diverse user base. You can select your preferred language in the settings section of the platform.

question7.question: Where does the information on Global Relocate come from?
question7.answer: The information on Global Relocate is sourced from a variety of reputable sources, including government websites, relocation experts, and user-generated content. We continuously update our database to ensure that users have access to the most accurate and relevant information for their relocation needs.

tax.taxCalculatorDesc: Calculate your estimated tax burden across different countries
tax.noTaxData: No tax data available for the selected country.
tax.taxIncomeInCountry: Tax income in ${1}: General Information & Tips
tax.taxClassBracketsDesc: The German income tax system employs progressive tax rates, meaning the rate increases as income rises. Starting at 14% for the lower taxable income levels and reaching up to 45% for the highest earners, this system aims to ensure fairness in taxation.
tax.taxClassBrackets2: 14% to 42% Tax Rate: Income above €11,604 and up to €66,760
tax.taxClassBrackets3: 42% Tax Rate: Income from €66,761 and up to €277,825
tax.taxClassBrackets5: Please consult a financial advisor for the most up to date information.
tax.taxClassBrackets6: Tax classes in Germany significantly affect how much tax you pay. There are six classes, each designed to reflect different family and employment situations. For instance, tax class I is for single individuals, while tax class II offers benefits for married couples. Choosing the correct tax class can lead to substantial tax savings, especially for families and married couples.
tax.taxClassBrackets7: Class I: Single or separated individuals without children.
tax.taxClassBrackets8: Class II: Single parents living alone with their child or children, eligible for single-parent benefits.
tax.taxClassBrackets9: Class III: Married employees whose spouse is not working or is in Class V; generally offers the lowest tax rates.
tax.taxClassBrackets10: Class IV: Married employees where both partners earn an income; similar to single individuals in Class I but with considerations for joint assessment.
tax.taxClassBrackets11: Class V: One partner in a marriage opts for Class III, and the other automatically falls into Class V; typically results in higher tax withholding.
tax.taxClassBrackets12: Class VI: For individuals with multiple jobs, this class applies to the second and any additional jobs, featuring the highest tax rate.
tax.taxClassBrackets13: Note: the calculator on this page is based on Class I.
tax.calculatingIncomeTaxDesc: Calculating your net income in Germany involves understanding not only the tax brackets and classes but also accounting for social contributions and other deductions. Here’s a simplified process to help you estimate your take-home pay:
tax.calculatingIncomeTaxSteps1: Determine Your Gross Salary: Start with your annual gross salary.
tax.calculatingIncomeTaxSteps2: Identify Your Tax Class: Your tax class affects your tax rate. Use this to estimate your income tax.
tax.calculatingIncomeTaxSteps3: Calculate Social Contributions: Deduct social security contributions, which typically include health insurance, pension insurance, unemployment insurance, and long-term care insurance.
tax.calculatingIncomeTaxSteps4: Factor in Allowances and Deductions: Include any applicable deductions such as childcare allowances or education-related expenses.
tax.calculatingIncomeTaxSteps5: Compute Net Salary: Subtract these taxes and contributions from your gross salary to get your net income.
tax.calculatingIncomeTaxFinalNote: This method offers a framework for understanding how much of your gross income will be available after taxes and social contributions.
tax.tipsForExpats: Tips for Expats and New Employees in Germany
tax.tipsForExpatsDesc: Expatriates and new employees in Germany face unique challenges when navigating the tax system. Here are practical tips to ensure a smooth transition and optimize your tax situation:
tax.tipsForExpats1: Choose the Right Tax Class: Review and select the most beneficial tax class for your situation. Changes are possible under certain conditions, such as marriage or the birth of a child.
tax.tipsForExpats2: Understand the Tax-Free Allowance: Germany offers a tax-free allowance, ensuring that income up to a certain threshold is not taxed. Familiarize yourself with this to better plan your finances.
tax.tipsForExpats3: Utilize Tax Deductions: Keep records of potentially deductible expenses, including work-related expenses, educational costs, and healthcare expenses.
tax.tipsForExpats4: Seek Professional Advice: Given the complexity of the tax system, consulting with a tax professional can provide personalized advice and ensure compliance.
tax.tipsForExpats5: Stay Informed on Tax Filing Deadlines: Be aware of the tax year and filing deadlines to avoid penalties.
tax.tipsForExpatFinalNote: These strategies can help manage your tax obligations effectively and maximize your income in Germany.
tax.faqTitle1: What are the current income tax brackets in Germany?
tax.faqAnswer1: As of the latest update, tax brackets are: 0% for income up to €11,604; 14%-42% for income between €11,604 and €66,760; 42% for income between €66,761 and €277,825; and 45% for income above €277,826.
tax.faqTitle2: How do I know which tax class I belong to in Germany?
tax.faqAnswer2: Your tax class depends on your marital status, employment situation, and family conditions. Single individuals are usually in class I, while married couples can benefit from class III. Review your status and consult a tax advisor for optimal classification.
tax.faqTitle3: What special considerations should I be aware of when calculating net salary in Germany?
tax.faqAnswer3: Remember to account for childcare allowances, potential church tax, and the solidarity surcharge, as these can impact your final net income.
tax.faqTitle4: How can new employees optimize their tax situation in Germany?
tax.faqAnswer4: Choosing the correct tax class, understanding the tax-free allowance, utilizing applicable deductions, seeking professional advice, and keeping informed about tax filing deadlines are key steps to optimizing your tax situation.
tax.useFulLinksIntro: The German income tax system can be challenging. However, by understanding the basics of tax brackets, classes, and special considerations, and by applying practical tips, you can make informed decisions that optimize your tax situation. Whether you are calculating net income, choosing a tax class, or exploring allowances and deductions, knowledge is your most valuable tool.
tax.useFulLinksIntro2: For more detailed information, consider visiting the following resources:
tax.useFulLinks1: Press and Information Office of the Federal Government
tax.useFulLinksFinalNote: Staying proactive and informed will empower you to navigate the tax landscape in Germany with confidence.
tax.taxDisclaimer: NOTE: Withholding tax is calculated based on the tax tables applicable in Germany. For simplification purposes, some variables (such as tax class, tax allowances, solidarity surcharge, church tax, and others) have been assumed or may not be fully accounted for. This calculation does not represent legal authority and shall be used for approximation purposes only. For accurate income tax calculations, especially for individuals with complex financial situations, it is recommended to consult with a tax advisor.
tax.summaryText5: That means that your net pay will be
tax.summaryText7: per month. Your average tax rate is
tax.disclaimer: The information provided by this tax calculator is for general informational purposes only and should not be used for tax, legal, or accounting purposes. The calculator also does not take into account your specific circumstances (personal allowances, deductions, and so on), which may affect the net income amount.
tax.usageGuide1: Enter your gross annual salary or income.
tax.usageGuide2: Select your country. By default, the output currency is set to the country's official currency.
tax.usageGuide3: If prompted, select your tax class from the drop-down.
tax.usageGuide4: Then click on Calculate Tax button to get the estimated tax according to the country's official rate.

upgradePage.upgradePlanDesc: Choose the perfect plan to support your global relocation journey. Get access to comprehensive tools and insights to make your move seamless.

visaIndex.title: Passport index and visa information
visaIndex.description: Here is an accurate and up-to-date passport ranking tool, which ranks the world's passports based on the number of visa-free travel destinations.
visaIndex.checkIfYouNeedVisa: Check if you need a visa
visaIndex.explorePassportRankingDesc: Discover the strength of your passport, which countries you can visit without the need for a visa, and the strongest passports in the world.
visaIndex.doINeedAVisaDesc: Find out if you need a visa to travel to your desired destination

faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.desc: Here, you will find answers to some of the most frequently asked questions about passport ranking and visas.
faqs.answer1: Visa-free countries are destinations that passport holders can enter without obtaining a visa beforehand. However, all travelers to visa-free countries must carry a valid passport or identity card to prove their nationality and identity throughout their journey.
faqs.answer2: The rank of a passport (passport ranking) refers to the position that the passport occupies in the overall passport ranking index. Compared to the passports of other countries around the world, the strength of a passport depends on the total mobility score that the passport provides to its holders. This is measured by the total number of countries to which its passport holder can travel to, either without a visa (visa-free access), with a visa on arrival, or with an electronic travel authorization. The greater the number of these destinations, the higher the total points for freedom of movement, and therefore the stronger the passport.
faqs.question3: What are the different types of passports?
faqs.answer3: There are many types of passports, including ordinary passports, official passports, diplomatic passports, service passports, and emergency passports.
faqs.answer4: Yes, you need a passport if you want to travel to another country. However, there are rare cases in which some countries allow citizens of other specific countries to enter their territory using only a national identification card (ID) instead of a passport.
faqs.answer5: A visa is required if the country you are planning to visit demands that you obtain one prior to entry.
faqs.answer6: A biometric passport or electronic passport is similar to an ordinary passport. The difference is that it contains a smart chip in its cover or on one of its pages, which includes the passport holder’s data. Biometric passports were created as a way to respond to the growing threat of identity theft and threats to national security.

visaRequirements.title: Visa Requirements
visaRequirements.desc: Find out the visa requirements for your destination country.

visaFree.title: Passport Visa Free Countries
visaFree.desc1: passport holders can travel to various countries around the world, each with distinct visa requirements. This comprehensive guide offers detailed information on the destinations that citizens of this country can visit without a prior visa, including lists of visa-free countries, visa-on-arrival countries, and Electronic Travel Authorization (eTA) countries. Additionally, this guide provides details on travel destinations that require a prior visa for this country's passport holders, including both electronic visas (eVisas) and regular visas.
visaFree.desc2: What are the visa-free countries for
visaFree.desc4: Passport holders can travel without a visa to the following
visaFree.desc6: The above list shows all the visa-exempt countries for {{ country }} citizens. However, it is important to recognize that the duration of stay and permissible purposes for travel for {{ country }} citizens in each country are subject to the respective nation's visa regulations. It is essential for {{ country }} passport holders to verify if a visa is required for extended stays beyond the allowed duration of stay or for purposes not encompassed within the Visa Waiver Policy of the destination country.

visaOnArrival.title: What countries provide visa on arrival for {{ country }} passport holders?
visaOnArrival.desc1: {{ country }} nationals are eligible for a visa on arrival in the following {{ count }} countries. In most cases, a visa can be obtained at the airport or border crossing point upon arrival. Fees, validity, and allowed duration of stay may vary.
visaOnArrival.desc2: Upon arrival at the immigration checkpoint in the destination country, travelers may need to complete the requisite paperwork, provide any necessary documentation, and pay the relevant visa fee. The immigration officer will subsequently issue the visa, granting the visitor authorization to enter and remain in the country for the specified duration and purpose.

eTA.title: Electronic Travel Authorization (eTA) Countries for {{ country }} Citizens
eTA.desc1: {{ country }} passport holders are eligible to obtain an Electronic Travel Authorization (eTA) prior to visiting the following {{ count }} countries. An eTA is a digital travel document required for eligible travelers who are visa-exempt for a specific country, and it can be obtained online prior to travel.
eTA.desc2: Many countries with eTA systems have a streamlined and efficient application process, with approval often granted within hours or a few days. It is important to note that eligibility for an eTA varies depending on the traveler's nationality and the destination country. Travelers are advised to always check the specific entry requirements of the destination country before planning their trip.

eVisa.title: Which countries do {{ country }} citizens need to apply for an e-visa?
eVisa.desc1: The following {{ count }} countries require {{ country }} nationals to apply for an electronic visa (eVisa) before traveling. An eVisa is a digital visa that can be applied for online and, in most cases, sent to the applicant's email. Processing times, fees, and validity may vary among different countries.
eVisa.desc2: The process of getting an eVisa typically involves filling out an online form, providing personal and passport information, uploading necessary documents (such as a passport-sized photo), and paying the visa fee. Once the application has been reviewed and approved, the e-Visa is sent to the applicant, usually via email, in a PDF or other electronic format. The traveler may need to print a copy to take with them when traveling. Requirements for e-Visas may vary depending on the traveler's nationality and the destination country. It is important to check the specific visa requirements for your destination country before planning your trip.

visaRequired.title: List of Countries Requiring Visas for {{ country }} Citizens
visaRequired.desc1: {{ country }} passport holders need to apply for a regular visa before traveling to the following {{ count }} countries:
visaRequired.desc2: Visa processing times, fees, and required documents vary by the traveler's nationality and the destination country. To obtain a visa, travelers generally need to apply at the destination country's embassy or consulate in their country of origin or country of residence, providing required documents such as a passport, photographs, itinerary, proof of financial means, and other relevant information. It is important to check the specific visa requirements for your destination country before planning your trip to ensure that you have the appropriate documents and permissions for your visit.
visaRequired.desc3: The above lists of visa-free destinations for this country passport holders are subject to change from time to time based on visa agreements between countries, temporary travel restrictions, and entry requirements imposed by countries. It is advised to check before traveling for any additional requirements or temporary restrictions that may be imposed by your travel destination country.

cookieConsentModal.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized ads or content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies. Read our {{ privacyPolicy }} for more info.
cookieConsentModal.necessaryCookiesMessage: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They ensure basic functionalities and security features of the website, anonymously.
cookieConsentModal.analyticsCookiesMessage: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.
cookieConsentModal.marketingCookiesMessage: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers.
cookieConsentModal.manageMessage: You can manage your cookie preferences here. Please note that blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience on our website.

toast.imageSizeShouldBeLess: Image size should be less than {{ size }}
toast.failedToCreateCheckout: Failed to create checkout session. Please try again.
